string.comment: Percentage value of a preference. %s represents the number to be replaced. Use \%% to represent a single percent sign (%)
string.name: pref_summary_percentage
pref_cat_general
string.comment: name of the general preference category

string.name: pref_cat_sync
string.comment: title of the sync preferences category

resources.string: Kirjoita vastaus kortin sisällä olevaan vastauskenttään
Palauta kielimääritykset (tekstissä puheeksi ja sanakirjoissa) kaikissa pakoissa
Display media filenames in the card browser question/answer fields
Sinun täytyy ottaa käyttöön eleet piilottaaksesi vastauspainikkeet
Liitä eleitä toimintoihin, kuten vastaamiseen ja korttien muokkaamiseen.
Allow touch gestures in screen corners
Open navigation drawer when swiped right from anywhere on the screen
Lue kysymys ja vausta, jos äänitiedosto ei tule mukana
Hakee automaattisesti puuttuvat mediat kun synkronoidaan.
Synkronoi automaattisesti sovelluksen auetessa tai suljetessam, jos viimeistä synkronoinnista on enemmän kuin 10 minuuttia.
Change the sync icon when changes can be uploaded
If disabled, you will be warned if you try to sync on a metered connection
Näytä vastaus automaattisesti ilman käyttäjän komentoa. Viive sisältää ajan automaattisesti toistetaville äänitiedostoille.

string.name: timeout_answer_seconds_summ
string.comment: The time to wait (in seconds) in the reviewer before automatically showing the next question or answer

resources.string: Hardware render is faster but may have problems, specifically on Android 8/8.1. If you cannot see parts of the card review user interface, try this setting.
Poista kaikki animaatiot käytöstä ja käytä turvallisempaa menetelmää korttien piirtämiseen. E-muste laitteet voivat vaatia tätä.
Allows \'Cloze Deletion\' context menu when in landscape mode.
A second tap of the answer buttons will be ignored if this time has not elapsed. This prevents accidental double taps
Show card counts, flag and mark in top bar
Piirrä shakkilauta Forsyth-Edwards-notaatiolla. Tekstin pitää olla ympäröity [fen][/fen] tunnisteilla.
Anna muiden sovellusten käyttää itsenäisesti AnkiDroidin tietoja
Listaa sovellukset jotka käyttävät AnkiDroid API:ta, kuten kansioita ja työkaluja.
Salli WebView-etäyhteydet ja tallenna kortti HTML AnkiDroid kansioon
By default Anki pastes images on the clipboard as JPG files to save disk space. You can use this option to paste as PNG images instead.
Press back twice to go back/exit
To avoid accidentally leaving the reviewer or the app
Allow all files in media imports
If Android doesn’t recognize a media file
Show stats for most recent deck
Näytä ennustetut tilastot, jotka perustuvat tulevien korttien laskentaan tai simulaation (käytössä) tai jo suunniteltuihin tuleviin harjoituksiin (ei käytössä).
Laske ensimmäiset n päivää, simuloi loput

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_none_of_the_two_servers_used
string.comment: This summary is shown when neither of the two custom sync servers are used, which is the default.

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_both_or_either_of_the_two_servers_used
string.comment: This summary is shown when either or both custom sync servers are used. The placeholders read either “default” or the custom URL.

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_placeholder_default
string.comment: This is shown in Custom sync server summary when either of the two sync servers is not used. E.g. “Collection: default” would mean that the default server, that is AnkiWeb, will be used for synchronization.

resources.string:
As an alternative to synchronizing with AnkiWeb, you may use your own servers for synchronization. You may specify either collection or media server, or both. If not set, the default AnkiWeb servers will be used instead. For example, you could use the sync server built into Anki Desktop to sync the collection when you only have a local network, and AnkiWeb to sync media when you have general internet access. Learn more

Note: unlike in previous AnkiDroid versions, you must specify the full custom sync URL, for example: https://example.com:8080/sync/.
Muutokset pakkaryhmän asetuksiin vaikuttaa useisiin pakkoihin. Jos haluat muuttaa vain nykyistä pakkaa, valitse uusi asetukset-ryhmä.

string.name: deck_conf_rev_cards
string.comment: Name of the deck options submenu for configuring reviews of due cards.

string.name: deck_conf_lps_cards
string.comment: Label of the submenu stating how lapses cards are treated.

string.name: deck_conf_general
string.comment: Label of the submenu for the general options of new deck

resources.string: Liittyvät uudet kortit haudataan seuraavaan päivään asti
Liittyvät kertaukset haudataan seuraavaan päivään asti
Use general \'Automatic display answer\' settings instead of using the settings for this group.
Toista sekä kysymyksen, että vastauksen äänet, kun vastaus näytetään

string.comment: Menu entry to rename a deck

resources.string: Ajoita kortit tämän pakan vastausten perusteella
Voit kehittää AnkiDroidia auttamalla kehitystiimiä näkemään mitä ominaisuuksia käytät

In the Note Editor, convert any instances of
to newlines when editing a card.
Fixes ‘􏿾’ appearing in typed answer results
Automatically focus the ‘type in answer’ field in the reviewer
These are our awesome contributors. You can help AnkiDroid too by programming, translating, donating and more!
AnkiDroid is released under the GPL-3.0 and AGPL-3.0 licenses, with the source code available on GitHub
You can support AnkiDroid\'s development by donating. Any amount is deeply appreciated.

string.name: display_binding_card_side_question
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the question

string.name: display_binding_card_side_answer
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the answer

string.name: display_binding_card_side_both
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to both the question and the answer

string.name: binding_remove_binding
string.comment: The parameter is the name of the key/gesture. Keys cannot be translated yet.

resources.string: Enables newer Anki features, such as the v3 scheduler\nUNSTABLE. Do not use on a collection you care about. NOT reverted on app close

There is a chance this could corrupt your installation completely, requiring app uninstall and deletion of the AnkiDroid folder, and has a chance of propagating corruption via sync to AnkiWeb.\n\nWe welcome the testing, but please make sure you have a valid non-AnkiWeb backup.

Please be sure before enabling developer options. These options are dangerous and could break the app or corrupt your collection.\n\nNote that these options are not suited for most users and therefore are not translated, so they are in English.

AnkiDroid periodically backs up your collection. After backups are more than two days old, AnkiDroid will start removing some of them to free up disk space.

Note that media files are not backed up. To be safe, please periodically synchronize your collection, or back up exports of it.

You can restore from a backup and export your collection in the deck list menu.

string.name: pref__widget_text__error
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating a generic error. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__widget_text__calculating
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating that the value, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

plurals.name: pref__widget_text__n_files_n_bytes
plurals.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, showing some statistics about a folder on disk if a form of “12 files\n26 MB”. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Delete images and other media that are not prefixed with _ and are not referenced by any notes
A media check is required to find unused media files

string.name: dialog__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can select unused media files to delete

string.name: pref__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Preference title

string.name: dialog__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can choose backups to delete

string.name: pref__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Delete collection, media, and backups. App settings are not deleted

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete your collection, media, and backups?

string.name: pref__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Delete collection, media, backups, and settings

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all data? This includes your collection, media, backups and preferences.\n\nNote: this action will close the window.

string.name: pref__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Delete settings and other app data

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete app data? This includes settings and other app data.\n\nNote: this action will close the window.

string.name: pref__etc__summary__fetching
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when the value is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__summary__no_collection
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when a preference is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: pref__etc__summary__error
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when there was an error fetching the value. For example, this is shown when the permission to access collection is lacking

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__fetching
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__calculating
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__no_collection
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference that is not usable because the collection does not exist
